venue.address_1: 100 Milk Street Entrance (Ten PO Sq Bldg)
venue.name: Exemplar Law Partners, LLC

item.description:
**PLEASE NOTE**: This group is a part of Revolve Nation, but has been specially formed for entertainers and professionals actively involved in the entertainment industry. Artists, writers, filmmakers, musicians, please come and share your ideas, questions and concerns with other like-minded professionals and receive valuable advice.

This month, I am pleased to announce our guest speaker, Jay Sweet. Jay is man who wears many hats in the music industry; he runs his own music consultancy agency, Sweet & Doggat, is an Editor at Large for Paste Magazine, and a Producer @ the Norfolk Folk Festival. I'm sure Jay will have some seriously valuable advice for both musicians and other professionals working in the industry. The topic(s) are still being refined, so if you have a specific topic or question you would like to see addressed, PLEASE email me in advance at sjamieson@exemplarlaw.com It's always about YOU GUYS, the members, so let's make sure we have the best program we can!

Thanks, and I hope to see you all on Nov 10th @ 6 pm @ our offices in Ten Post Office Sq, 8th Floor, Boston.

Very Best,

Shannon
item.name: Revolve Nation ENTERTAINMENT Meetup & Roundtable Discussion Group
